snippet.title: High-precision efficiency calibration of a high-purity co-axial germanium detector
snippet.description: High-precision efficiency calibration of a high-purity co-axial germanium detector / Blank, B ; Souin, J ; Ascher, P ; Audirac, L ; Canchel, G ; Gerbaux, M ; Grevy, S ; Giovinazzo, J ; Guerin, H ; Nieto, T Kurtukian et al. A high-purity co-axial germanium detector has been calibrated in efficiency to a precision of about 0.15% over a wide energy range. [...] arXiv:1404.1246. \- 2014\. Preprint

snippet.title: Measurement of the parity-violating asymmetry parameter $\alpha_b$ and the helicity amplitudes for the decay $\Lambda_b^0\to J/\psi\Lambda^0$ with the ATLAS detector
snippet.description: Measurement of the parity-violating asymmetry parameter $\alpha_b$ and the helicity amplitudes for the decay $\Lambda_b^0\to J/\psi\Lambda^0$ with the ATLAS detector / ATLAS Collaboration A measurement of the parity-violating decay asymmetry parameter, $\alpha_b$, and the helicity amplitudes for the decay $\Lambda_b^0\to J/\psi(\mu^+\mu^-) \Lambda^0 (p\pi^-)$ is reported. [...] CERN-PH-EP-2014-034 ; arXiv:1404.1071. \- 2014\. - 12 p. Previous draft version \- Full text

snippet.title: A conservative adaptive wavelet method for the shallow water equations on the sphere
snippet.description: A conservative adaptive wavelet method for the shallow water equations on the sphere / Aechtner, Matthias ; Kevlahan, Nicholas ; Dubos, Thomas We introduce an innovative wavelet-based approach to dynamically adjust the local grid resolution to maintain a uniform specified error tolerance. [...] arXiv:1404.0405. \- 2014\. Preprint

snippet.title: The Structure of the Local Interstellar Medium. VI. New MgII, FeII, and MnII Observations Toward Stars Within 100 Parsecs
snippet.description: The Structure of the Local Interstellar Medium. VI. New MgII, FeII, and MnII Observations Toward Stars Within 100 Parsecs / Malamut, Craig ; Redfield, Seth ; Linsky, Jeffrey L ; Wood, Brian E ; Ayres, Thomas R We analyze high-resolution spectra obtained with the Space Telescope Imaging Spectrograph onboard the Hubble Space Telescope toward 34 nearby stars (<100 pc) to record MgII, FeII and MnII absorption due to the local interstellar medium (LISM). [...] arXiv:1403.8096. \- 2014\. - 58 p. Preprint

snippet.title: The method of approximate inverse theory and applications
snippet.description: The method of approximate inverse theory and applications / Schuster, Thomas Inverse problems arise whenever one tries to calculate a required quantity from given measurements of a second quantity that is associated to the first one [...] Berlin : Springer, 2007. (Lecture Notes in Mathematics ; 1906)

snippet.title: H-alpha Spectral diversity of type II supernovae

We present a spectroscopic analysis of the H-alpha profiles of hydrogen-rich type II supernovae. [...] arXiv:1403.7089. \- 2014\. - 9 p. Preprint

snippet.description: 3D Particle Track Reconstrution in a Single Layer Cadmium-Telluride Hybrid Active Pixel Detector / Filipenko, Mykhaylo ; Gleixner, Thomas ; Anton, Gisela ; Michel, Thilo In the past 20 years the search for neutrinoless double beta decay has driven many developements in all kind of detector technology. snippet.title: New Benchmark Set of Transition-Metal Coordination Reactions for the Assessment of Density Functionals
snippet.description: New Benchmark Set of Transition-Metal Coordination Reactions for the Assessment of Density Functionals / Weymuth, Thomas ; Couzijn, Erik P A ; Chen, Peter ; Reiher, Markus We present the WCCR10 data set of ten ligand dissociation energies of large cationic transition metal complexes for the assessment of approximate exchange--correlation functionals. [...] arXiv:1403.5758. \- 2014\. - 36 p. Preprint

snippet.title: Cosmological Constraints from the double source plane lens SDSSJ0946+1006
snippet.description: Cosmological Constraints from the double source plane lens SDSSJ0946+1006 / Collett, Thomas E ; Auger, Matthew W We present constraints on the equation of state of dark energy, $w$, and the total matter density, $\Omega_{\mathrm{M}}$, derived from the double-source-plane strong lens SDSSJ0946+1006, the first cosmological measurement with a galaxy-scale double-source-plane lens. [...] arXiv:1403.5278. \- 2014\. Preprint

snippet.title: A nucleotide-level coarse-grained model of RNA
snippet.description: A nucleotide-level coarse-grained model of RNA / Šulc, Petr ; Romano, Flavio ; Ouldridge, Thomas E ; Doye, Jonathan P K ; Louis, Ard A We present a new, nucleotide-level model for RNA, oxRNA, based on the coarse-graining methodology recently developed for the oxDNA model of DNA. [...] arXiv:1403.4180. \- 2014\. - 25 p. Preprint
